snippet.title: NEW 1-Bit Adventure! 🚀 Telly the TV - Download Today on Itch & Gamejolt! - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Today! ON SALE!! one dollar! Free Demo (Play in Browser)
https://gamejolt.com/games/tellythetv/920810
https://extramustard.itch.io/telly-the-tv

For only one dollar?  You spend more money at McDonalds!  Telly the TV is a throwback action/adventure platformer with a nostalgic 1-bit style.

Extra mustard games is officially announcing the release of our game "Telly the TV."

You Play as Telly, the living CRT television set, in a scavenger-hunt gone wild.  Telly’s been trapped in TV Kingdom by the evil Robo-Queen.  Telly’s only hope of surviving is navigating each television show, all while trying to locate five remote-control-keys to escape each episode.  

Enter five exciting and quirky worlds while bashing baddies and traversing terrible traps!  Collect items to save each TV program, and face-off with the enemies of TV Kiingdom.  Get instant gaming gratification as you explore the mysteries of this strange TV show.  

- Precision Platforming and Level Exploration - No tutorials, no instructions, no hand-holding, no cutscenes, no time wasted while you jam through each stage with tight controls. 
- Five Unique Worlds  - Help Telly escape a construction site, a haunted house, a space facility, a hidden temple, and an Evil Castle.
- 15 Challenging Levels - Telly needs to smash enemies, avoid traps, to make it through each stage in this unique 1-bit world
- Controller Support - Effortlessly assist Telly in TV Kingdom with your PS4 or Xbox Controller.  Keyboard is also supported too!
- 8 Original Songs - Original Music produced with Yamaha YM2612 software for that zesty Genesis sound

Download Telly the TV today!  Full Game now available on Itch and Gamejolt.  Microsoft Windows Store By Mid September!

Download Today! ON SALE!! one dollar!  
https://gamejolt.com/games/tellythetv/920810
https://extramustard.itch.io/telly-the-tv
